description: Styles for a web-based Tic Tac Toe game frontend, including variable definitions for colors, layout styles for different game components, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: app
classes.description: Sets up the main application container with flexbox layout and background.

classes.name: card
classes.description: Defines styles for individual cards in the layout.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout for the game board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for each square on the game board, including hover and focus effects.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Styling for the control buttons and layout.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: General button styles with hover and active states.
